display.title: Melt Pesky Obsidian!!
display.description:
Turns Obsidian to Magma blocks and Evaporates water.
Standing to close will hurt!
If you are wearing a Netherite Chestplate or a Chains+ Chest piece you will not be damaged by the blast!
Place Blue Ice and Ancient debris in a crafting grid, spit your leggings on the ground and eat the item you crafted to give your leggings Thermodynamics. (immune to Thermite/Cryo-Bomb)
